gghisse 0.1.1
  • Reference

Extract estimated diversification rates from a multistate HiSSE model (MuSSE, MuHiSSE or CID)

Source: R/utilhisse.R
m_diversification_rates.Rd

A helper function that formats hisse::MuHiSSE's diversification parameter estimates into a data frame

m_diversification_rates(model_fit, states)

Arguments

model_fit

A muhisse fit object
states

A vector of observed character states

Value

The estimated diversification rates formatted in a data.frame

Examples


States <- c("mp", "mb", "fp", "fb")

# muhisse model
data("diatoms")
m_diversification_rates(model_fit = diatoms$muhisse, states=States)

#> # A tibble: 8 x 6
#>   State Turnover Extinction_fraction Speciation Extinction Net_diversification
#>   <chr>    <dbl>               <dbl>      <dbl>      <dbl>               <dbl>
#> 1 mp1     0.0976               0.771     0.0551     0.0425              0.0126
#> 2 mb1     0.0977               0.771     0.0552     0.0425              0.0126
#> 3 fp1     0.204                0.771     0.115      0.0887              0.0264
#> 4 fb1     0.170                0.771     0.0961     0.0741              0.0220
#> 5 mp2     0.615                0.771     0.347      0.268               0.0795
#> 6 mb2     0.569                0.771     0.321      0.248               0.0736
#> 7 fp2     1.42                 0.771     0.802      0.618               0.184 
#> 8 fb2     0.987                0.771     0.557      0.430               0.128 

# CID8 model
m_diversification_rates(model_fit = diatoms$cid8, states=States)

#> # A tibble: 32 x 6
#>    State   Turnover Extinction_fracti…  Speciation  Extinction Net_diversificat…
#>    <chr>      <dbl>              <dbl>       <dbl>       <dbl>             <dbl>
#>  1 mp1      1.90e-1              0.841     1.03e-1     8.69e-2    0.0164        
#>  2 mb1      1.90e-1              0.841     1.03e-1     8.69e-2    0.0164        
#>  3 fp1      1.90e-1              0.841     1.03e-1     8.69e-2    0.0164        
#>  4 fb1      1.90e-1              0.841     1.03e-1     8.69e-2    0.0164        
#>  5 mp2      7.58e-8              0.841     4.12e-8     3.46e-8    0.00000000653 
#>  6 mb2      7.58e-8              0.841     4.12e-8     3.46e-8    0.00000000653 
#>  7 fp2      7.58e-8              0.841     4.12e-8     3.46e-8    0.00000000653 
#>  8 fb2      7.58e-8              0.841     4.12e-8     3.46e-8    0.00000000653 
#>  9 mp3      1.03e-8              0.841     5.60e-9     4.71e-9    0.000000000888
#> 10 mb3      1.03e-8              0.841     5.60e-9     4.71e-9    0.000000000888
#> # … with 22 more rows

# musse model, no hidden states
m_diversification_rates(model_fit = diatoms$musse, states = States)

#> # A tibble: 4 x 6
#>   State Turnover Extinction_fraction Speciation Extinction Net_diversification
#>   <chr>    <dbl>               <dbl>      <dbl>      <dbl>               <dbl>
#> 1 mp1      0.254               0.873     0.136      0.119               0.0172
#> 2 mb1      0.184               0.873     0.0984     0.0860              0.0125
#> 3 fp1      0.640               0.873     0.342      0.298               0.0432
#> 4 fb1      0.821               0.873     0.438      0.383               0.0555
